title: New HQ Image From Disney's Snow White Has Been Released
description: A new still from Disney's Snow White has been released. It gives a great shot of the Evil Queen's costumes for all of the cosplayers.
author: Kaitlyn Booth
excerpt: Mufasa: The Lion King seems to have rallied at the box office, but using that as proof that people are still interested in Disney live-action remakes is kind of stupid. So, the real test will be Disney's Snow White, which will be released in March. This movie feels like there is a lot going against [‚Ä¶]
text: Posted in: Disney, Movies | Tagged: snow whiteA new still from Disney's Snow White has been released. It gives a great shot of the Evil Queen's costumes for all of the cosplayers.Article Summary A new still from Disney's Snow White unveils a detailed look the Evil Queen's costume. Despite initial skepticism, Mufasa rallied at the box office, proving future potential for Disney remakes. Snow White hits theaters on March 21, 2025, and could surprise audiences like its Disney predecessors. Gal Gadot as the Evil Queen and Rachel Zegler as Snow White in the latest Disney live-action remake. Mufasa: The Lion King seems to have rallied at the box office, but using that as proof that people are still interested in Disney live-action remakes is kind of stupid. So, the real test will be Disney's Snow White, which will be released in March. This movie feels like there is a lot going against it, and no one has been that excited. While Snow White's costumes have been getting a lot of flack, maybe people will give some more grace to the Evil Queen. She looks pretty cool, and Disney has released a still that feels like it was specifically geared toward cosplayers so they could get all the details ready for the spring and summer convention season. We still have some time to go for the narrative to flip on this film, and it really seemed like no one was interested in¬†Mufasa, and that managed to turn things around quite nicely, so who knows ‚Äî stranger things have certainly happened. (L-R) Gal Gadot as Evil Queen and Rachel Zegler as Snow White in Disney's live-action SNOW WHITE. Photo by Giles Keyte. ¬© 2024 Disney Enterprises, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Snow White: Summary, Cast List, Release Date Disney's Snow White, a live-action musical reimagining of the classic 1937 film, opens exclusively in theaters on March 21, 2025. Starring Rachel Zegler (West Side Story) in the title role and Gal Gadot (Wonder Woman) as her Stepmother, the Evil Queen, the magical music adventure journeys back to the timeless story with beloved characters Bashful, Doc, Dopey, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, and Sneezy. Disney's Snow White¬†is directed by Marc Webb (The Amazing Spider-Man) and produced by Marc Platt (The Little Mermaid) and Jared LeBoff (The Girl on the Train), with Callum McDougall (Mary Poppins Returns) serving as executive producer, and features all-new original songs from Benj Pasek and Justin Paul (Dear Evan Hansen). html:
Posted in: Disney, Movies | Tagged: snow white

A new still from Disney's Snow White has been released. It gives a great shot of the Evil Queen's costumes for all of the cosplayers.

Article Summary

  • A new still from Disney's Snow White unveils a detailed look the Evil Queen's costume.
  • Despite initial skepticism, Mufasa rallied at the box office, proving future potential for Disney remakes.
  • Snow White hits theaters on March 21, 2025, and could surprise audiences like its Disney predecessors.
  • Gal Gadot as the Evil Queen and Rachel Zegler as Snow White in the latest Disney live-action remake.

Mufasa: The Lion King seems to have rallied at the box office, but using that as proof that people are still interested in Disney live-action remakes is kind of stupid. So, the real test will be Disney's Snow White, which will be released in March. This movie feels like there is a lot going against it, and no one has been that excited. While Snow White's costumes have been getting a lot of flack, maybe people will give some more grace to the Evil Queen. She looks pretty cool, and Disney has released a still that feels like it was specifically geared toward cosplayers so they could get all the details ready for the spring and summer convention season. We still have some time to go for the narrative to flip on this film, and it really seemed like no one was interested in¬†Mufasa, and that managed to turn things around quite nicely, so who knows ‚Äî stranger things have certainly happened.

Snow White: Summary, Cast List, Release Date

Disney's Snow White, a live-action musical reimagining of the classic 1937 film, opens exclusively in theaters on March 21, 2025. Starring Rachel Zegler (West Side Story) in the title role and Gal Gadot (Wonder Woman) as her Stepmother, the Evil Queen, the magical music adventure journeys back to the timeless story with beloved characters Bashful, Doc, Dopey, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy, and Sneezy. Disney's Snow White¬†is directed by Marc Webb (The Amazing Spider-Man) and produced by Marc Platt (The Little Mermaid) and Jared LeBoff (The Girl on the Train), with Callum McDougall (Mary Poppins Returns) serving as executive producer, and features all-new original songs from Benj Pasek and Justin Paul (Dear Evan Hansen).

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

About Kaitlyn Booth

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.

Netflix's The Chronicles Of Narnia Is Coming To IMAX Theaters

Greta Gerwig's adaptation of The Chronicles of Narnia has secured a Christmas 2026 streaming release date and will be in IMAX theaters for two weeks starting Thanksgiving 2026.

Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow: David Krumholtz, Emily Beecham Join Cast

David Krumholtz and Emily Beecham have reportedly joined the cast of Supergirl: Woman of Tomorrow as Kara Zor-El's parents.

Captain America: Brave New World ‚Äì TV Spot, 6 Posters, Tickets On Sale

Tickets for Captain America: Brave New World have officially gone on sale. A new TV spot and six new [decent] posters have been released.

The Ballad of Wallis Island: Official Trailer, 2 Images, And Summary

Focus Features has released the official trailer, two images, and a summary for The Ballad of Wallis Island, which will released on March 28, 2025.

Until Dawn: Official Trailer & 5 Images Tease One Hell Of a Time Loop

Sony has released the official trailer and five images for the Until Dawn movie, which will be released on April 25, 2025.
